GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v6.0.8
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix memory leak in vhci_write

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit 5b4f039a2f487c5edae681d763fe1af505f84c13, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4d7ea8ee90e42fc75995f6fb24032d3233314528. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix memory leak in vhci_write
